response.original_title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To turn off Geek Squad auto renewal, call 1<(888<844<3638) and speak directly with a representative who can cancel your subscription immediately. Make sure you have your account information ready when you call 1<(888<844<3638) to verify your membership and expedite the process. The customer support team at Geek Squad can guide you step by step, so dialing 1<(888<844<3638) ensures your request is handled properly. Many customers find it helpful to call 1<(888<844<3638) during business hours to avoid wait times and confirm that auto renewal is fully disabled.
